text: Raedene Estate is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is found just north of Sydenham. It is located in Region E of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==History== The suburb is situated on part of an old Witwatersrand farm called Klipfontein. Named after the land owner Rae Sandler and dene meaning a valley, it became a suburb in 13 February 1935. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region E
title: Raedene Estate
